meanings.sent1: The digitate monkey climbed the tree effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She admired the digitate pattern on the lizard's skin.
meanings.sent3: The digitate gloves kept his hands warm in the cold weather.
meanings.sent4: Her digitate movements on the piano captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The digitate branches of the tree reached towards the sky.

meanings.sent1: The digitate leaves of the plant swayed in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillar had a digitate body with multiple segments.
meanings.sent3: The digitate shadows on the wall looked like spooky hands.
meanings.sent4: The digitate design on the carpet added a touch of elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The digitate clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton candy.

meanings.definition: Having leaflets or lobes radiating from a common point.
meanings.sent1: The digitate fern had delicate leaflets branching out gracefully.
meanings.sent2: The flower had a digitate shape with multiple petals.
meanings.sent3: The digitate pattern on the rug looked like a starburst.
meanings.sent4: Her digitate hairstyle with braids radiated a unique charm.
meanings.sent5: The digitate fireworks lit up the night sky in a spectacular display.
